abstract: Big Ticket column; four bedroom penthouse with landscaped terrace and reflecting pool at 7 Harrison Street in TriBeCa is highest residential sale of the week in New York City, closing at $18,574,000.
lead_paragraph: A penthouse atop a converted warehouse, with a landscaped terrace and a reflecting pool, was the sale of the week.

headline.main: In TriBeCa, an Urban Oasis of Glass for $18.57 Million

snippet: A penthouse atop a converted warehouse, with a landscaped terrace and a reflecting pool, was the sale of the week.
